item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Sunday, February 9, 2025 at 9:15 PM UTC
item.description:

2. LIMO: Less Is More for Reasoning (148 points | 60 comments)

22. Why Blog If Nobody Reads It? (130 points | 85 comments)
